alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:03AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON...WEST CENTRAL LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM EDT... At 1202 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Henderson Harbor to near Pulaski. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Fort Drum, Carthage, Lowville, Pulaski, West Carthage, Clayton, Adams, Dexter, Glen Park, Herrings, Kring Point State Park, Adams Center, Wellesley Island State Park, Southwick Beach State Park, Redwood, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, and Richland. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 33 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central New York.
